long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions inserts buttons on JIRAs atlassian.net pages next to standard operations to copy the current selected issues key and summary into the clipboard for faster and more convenient copy&paste usage.

Source Code can be found at https://github.com/daberni/jira-copy-comments. Contributions are welcome.
